item.description:
August Monthly Meet Up!

MARGARITAS in Waltham
211 Moody Street, Waltham, MA
(781) 893-9990

http://www.margs.com/...

Hi Everybody!

Margaritas is back on the calendar! Great food, great friends, great conversation. Margaritas has been a great meetup for us because there's something for everyone! Some of us just want a drink, others can have a whole meal, or a few chip in together and get a bunch of appetizers. It's all good, but ALL of us go for the company!

Since everyone loves Margaritas, we're going to keep this on the calendar and meet here every month. A few days before, I'll send an email to you with my phone number. If you RSVP but later change your mind, or something comes up, please change your RSVP or call and let me know so that we can get the right sized table. Joanne will meet you all at the door and give you a lei. Not only does it help everyone find each other, but it makes for some interesting jokes.

See you all there! debbie

Margaritas Website

group.name: Boston/Burbs Life after Divorce Social Group
